author: Special Correspondent
text: A huge cache of arms and ammunition was recovered from a hideout in Reasi district of Jammu and Kashmir. An Udhampur-based defence spokesman said the Army’s Rashtriya Rifles, Reasi, and the police cordoned the area in Bajali, Dandihalya, after receiving specific information. Meanwhile, the police arrested a militant in south Kashmir’s Shopian district. According to the police, he was among the four youth who joined militants along with a cop recently.
title: Arms seized in Jammu; militant held in Valley
